alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 8:17AM PST until December 28 at 7:56PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Oregon... Marys River near Philomath affecting Benton County. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oregon...Washington... Tualatin River near Dilley affecting Washington County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Clatsop and Tillamook Counties. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect continued flooding of low lying farm land and structures from Foss downstream to Mohler and Nehalem. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 16.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM PST Wednesday was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage around 4 pm this afternoon and continue falling through Friday. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Don`t drive around road closure barricades or into flooded areas. Find another route. Additional information is available at weather.gov/portland. The next statement will be issued by 4 pm PST today.
